alert.note: Alert for Gallatin (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 12 at 9:58AM MDT until June 16 at 4:00PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Great Falls MT has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Montana... Gallatin River near DCP-Gallatin R/Gateway affecting Gallatin County. Gallatin River at Logan affecting Gallatin County. .Heavy rain falling on a melting snowpack is causing rising river levels. For the Gallatin River...including DCP-Gallatin R/Gateway, Logan... Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO THURSDAY AFTERNOON... ...REPLACES RIVER FLOOD WATCH... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Gallatin River near DCP-Gallatin R/Gateway. * WHEN...From this evening to Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 7.0 feet, Minor roads in gallatin gateway covered with water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM MDT Sunday the stage was 5.4 feet. - Forecast...The river will oscillate around flood stage with a maximum value of 6.9 feet early Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 6.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 6.7 feet on 06/02/1997. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued by Monday morning.Monday morning at 1000 AM MDT.
